title: Creating Discussions
body:
I can't post or reply to comments on my account. It says I must be level 7 but I am and I play ranked frequently on this account. 

Please help me so i can't talk about these upcoming patches.

replies.body: Sometimes your boards account needs a little push to make sure it correctly updates with your Summoner level. Looks like posting here did the trick! Go forth, and discuss!!
